author: Dan Cain For Mailonline
title: Kourtney Kardashian wows at Grammy's after party in LA | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now The beauty put on a busty display in an LBD of her own which boasted cut out sides to showcase her curves. Following closely behind was Corey, who opted for more of a smart-casual style comprising of a green cardigan over a white tee, blue jeans and dark boots. He guided a smiling Kourtney into the back of a black SUV ready to be whisked away into then night. After stunning at the annual Clive Davis pre-Grammys party in Beverly Hills on Saturday evening, Kourtney gave a mystery man a lap dance in a raunchy Snapchat video before gorging on French fries. Here come the girls: The reality television star sauntered out of the venue hand in hand with a stunning female pal Sartorially in sync: The beauty put on a busty display in an LBD of her own which boasted cut out sides to showcase her curves Meanwhile, last week brunette beauty Bella Banos claimed to InTouch Weekly she was the woman Kourtney's ex Scott Disick had snuck into his hotel in Costa Rica during a vacation with the Kardashians. After security told Kris Jenner and Kim Kardashian where he was and that he was with a woman, the duo confronted him, triggering an argument that ended with Scott jetting to Miami. He was then pictured enjoying the company of several scantily clad women in Miami in the days following. Chaperone: Following closely behind was Kris Jenner's beau Corey Gamble, who opted for more of a smart-casual style comprising of a green cardigan over a white tee, blue jeans and dark boots Share or comment on this article 313
